scorePolicy:
10 次報告成績：預報 2 分，結報 8 分
當次沒有來做實驗就沒有當次結報分數，不補做。可以請同學幫忙交預報，算分數。
for each experiment, everyone will turn in a preparation report, which counts 2 points, each group will turn in a summary report a week later, which counts 8 points.
your final grade will be the sum of your 10 (preparation report+summary report)
